name: You, Me and Aliens
description:
Your ship crashed on an alien planet.
Use your lovely gun to defend yourself and your robot
while he tries to collect the resources
so that you can repair your ship ... or upgrade something instead.

How to play:
Move with [W], [A], [S], [D]
Shoot with [Left Mouse]
Interact with your ship with [E]

Made by:
xr3alx (programming, gamedesign, soundeffects)norrimo (art, gamedesign, soundeffects)

Music by:
ghoulferatu
